Word Counter

Free online word and character counting tool

Welcome to our free online word and character counter tool. Easily and quickly count words and characters in your content. No installation required — just copy and paste your text to get started.

Words: 0

Characters: 0

How do I use the word counter tool?

Using our word counter tool is incredibly simple. Just follow these two quick steps:

  • Copy and paste your content into the input box.
  • Instantly see the word and character counts below.

Why do you need a word counter tool?

A word counter helps you instantly measure the length and structure of your content. It's essential for writing, editing, SEO, work-related tasks, and social media posts.

Benefits of using a word counter tool

  • Real-time feedback: See your word and character count update as you type or paste text.
  • Writing efficiency: Stay within word or character limits for assignments, blog posts, or social media.
  • Editing support: Easily identify long sentences or paragraphs for better clarity.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

What is a word counter tool?

A word counter is an online tool that helps you count the number of words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in your content.

How does this tool work?

This tool uses a lightweight JavaScript function to analyze your text and instantly provide statistics.

Can I use this tool for different languages?

Yes, this tool supports multiple languages and can count words in any language.
